body.name: Brutal Rival: A Standalone Dark Fantasy Romance (The Princesses of Ruin Book 1)
body.description: He wants his bloodthirsty rival for a wife.She only wants the queen's head on a pike.Scarlett Bloodletter narrowly escaped her own assassination at the tender age of fourteen. Why had her mother, the queen, tried to kill her? Beats Scarlett, but she assumed it was because she was a nomaj. Without a drop of magic in Scarlett’s blood, she was useless to the throne. Reduced to all kinds of deplorable things to survive the harsh streets of the kingdom’s poverty-stricken “Underbelly,” Scarlett has grown into a feared criminal with two things on her mind: kill the queen and liberate her sisters, the only people she still has a heart for…until Zane.Zane, the Spider Lord, is a fearsome gang leader of the Underbelly known for decapitating his victims and poisoning his rivals. There’s only one thing he more fiercely protects than his territory: his Nomaj Princess of Prayers, Scarlett. He’ll do anything to keep her off her knees and will kill anyone who looks at her twice.After one passionate night leads Zane to discover Scarlett’s dirty secret, he’s helpless to resist her cause. After all, what’s more exciting than plotting to kill a queen?For fans of Rebecca Yarros, Carissa Broadbent, and Sarah J Maas. The Princesses of Ruin is a four-part, standalone series set in a magic-based world with Victorian era vibes, possessive men, powerful princesses, and the demons they have to fight to survive in their grim kingdom. Claim your copy now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A truly marvelous story
reviews.reviewText: If you like dark, twisted, and smutty stories about an FMC that can both take care of those she loves and take care of the trash that tries to harm them, this is a book for you.Brutal Rival is the first book in the Princesses of Ruin series, and I am SO happy to have found it! This book is full of sinister plots and deranged situations, ones that had me reeling with every twist and turn they took. There was drama, action, laughs, and tears. And a VERY spicy MMC that falls first and falls HARD!Each character was so well written, and the scenery so artfully explained that I could see and feel everything that was happening on the page. Ember Holt brought this world to life in the most amazing way that I know im going to be hooked until the very end. It was an absolute roller coaster that I am going to be buzzing from until I can get my hands on the next one!In conclusion, go get this book. Get it and all the others that come after it. You're going to want to keep them all as you lose yourself to the Princesses of Ruin and their hunky and fascinating loves. ❤️❤️❤️❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I started this a hot minute ago and I will say the story progressed rather quickly. The sass and banter between the MFC and MMC are great. I enjoyed this story and am looking forward to book 2! I’m also curious about the queen and how she’s the way she is…maybe more answers in the next book!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I NEED MORE!!
reviews.reviewText: "Scarlett is my rival. Mine to torment and chase. She won’t be going anywhere."I loooooooved it!!! If you love fantasy, sassy banter, touch them & d!3, rivals to lovers,a powerful FMC, a protective MMC, a touch of mafia vibes, and spice then you should definitely check this series out.Scarlett is a bada$$ and Zane is perfection😍.Scarlett and Zane both want revenge on the crown.Can they work together or are they doomed to fail?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars What a dream team Scarlett and Zane are!
reviews.reviewText: I really enjoyed this book! The chemistry between Zane and Scarlett was off the charts hot! The world building is on point and the secondary characters are developing well. I am very much looking forward to seeing how the story progresses in Feral Guardian!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars this book was sooo goood!!!
reviews.reviewText: This book was absolutely amazing! I love the way the characters were portrayed through the book and I am in awe of the details in the storyline that really pulled everything together.The FMC is a strong as heck woman who is no damsel in distress with awesome powers. But she also has trauma from her past that keeps her from fully allowing herself to feel emotion toward those she is closest to in life and she goes through a journey to heal with the help of the MMC and other characters who give her a little push in the right direction.The MMC… don’t even get me started with how much I love him. He is the three sexy P’s. Powerful, protective, and possessive. I love how he is the one who fell first and he will do everything in his power to keep her safe even if she doesn’t let him.This book is a slow burn but becomes oh so steamy. It’s got everything you could ever want. Fantasy, magical powers, spice, strong FMC, sexy MMC, and the suspenseful twists will have you on the edge your seat reading eagerly to find out what happens next! I strongly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I loved this book!
reviews.reviewText: I would not recommend reading if you have arachnophobia, though, Lol. It was a different style mafia themed dark fantasy romance. I really enjoyed it. Scarlett is a strong, sassy, badass. With multiple personas. Zane is a lord of the underbelly that has taken an interest in Scarlett and can't seem to get her off his mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I needed 200- 300 more pages of this book tbh
reviews.reviewText: Fun ride. Quick short form fiction. Reminds me of an Anastasia retelling. Could’ve been longer. World building was there but I felt like you’re enjoying the story and then the book just ends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unique and addicting
reviews.reviewText: I loved this book! Different fantasy from what I’ve read before. It’s unique and addicting! The story flowed very well, good writing and amazing ending. Sets the tone for the second book, which I can’t wait to read!

This is a great story about a princess and what she has to do to survive after her mother tries to kill her. Great storyline , I cried, I giggled, what more can you ask for. Will be getting the next in the series. I can't wait.
